plain_meaning_en: Guilty finding but no further penalty or conditions.
plain_meaning_tr: Suç sabit görülür; ek ceza/koşul uygulanmadan sonuçlanır.
example_en: The court granted an absolute discharge.

plain_meaning_en: Person charged with an offence.
example_en: The accused is present in court.

plain_meaning_en: Not guilty finding; accused is free to go.
A law passed by government.
example_en: This Act applies to the case.

plain_meaning_en: The physical act/omission of the offence.
example_en: The Crown must prove the actus reus.

plain_meaning_en: Postponing the matter to another date/time.
Evidence the judge can consider under rules.
plain_meaning_tr: Mahkemenin usule göre dikkate alabileceği delil.

plain_meaning_en: A written statement sworn/affirmed as true.
plain_meaning_tr: Doğru olduğuna yemin/teyit edilen yazılı beyan.

plain_meaning_en: Alternative to trial for less serious offences.
plain_meaning_tr: Daha hafif suçlarda yargılama yerine alternatif süreç.
example_en: The matter was resolved through diversion.

plain_meaning_en: Request for a higher court to review a decision.
Document requiring the person to attend court.
plain_meaning_tr: Kişiyi belirli tarihte mahkemeye çağıran belge.

plain_meaning_en: Request asking the court to decide an issue.
Charges are read and the accused enters a plea.
example_tr: Zabıt kâtibi suç isnadının okunması işlemini yaptı.

plain_meaning_en: Order authorizing police to arrest someone.
plain_meaning_tr: Polisin kişiyi yakalamasına yetki veren emir.
example_en: A warrant was issued for his arrest.

plain_meaning_en: Hearing to decide release or detention before trial.
plain_meaning_tr: Yargılama öncesi tahliye mi tutukluluk mu kararı.
example_en: A bail hearing is scheduled today.
example_tr: Bugün tutuksuz yargılama talebi duruşması var.

plain_meaning_en: Court order releasing accused with conditions.
example_en: He is out on bail with conditions.

plain_meaning_en: Warrant issued for failing to appear or comply.
plain_meaning_tr: Mahkemeye gelmeme vb. nedenle çıkarılan emir.

plain_meaning_en: High standard required to convict in criminal law.
plain_meaning_tr: Mahkûmiyet için gereken yüksek ispat standardı.
example_en: The Crown must prove it beyond a reasonable doubt.

plain_meaning_en: Who must prove the case/issue.
example_en: The burden of proof is on the Crown.

plain_meaning_en: Previous court decisions used as authority.
Specific offence alleged.
example_en: He faces a charge of assault.

plain_meaning_en: Final submissions summarizing the case.
Order that the accused will stand trial (where applicable).
example_en: The judge ordered committal to trial.

plain_meaning_en: Person alleged to be harmed by the offence.
plain_meaning_tr: Suçtan zarar gördüğü iddia edilen kişi.

plain_meaning_en: Guilty finding with conditions; not a conviction.
plain_meaning_tr: Suç sabit; koşullarla, mahkûmiyet kaydı olmadan.

plain_meaning_en: Legally binding direction of the court.
example_en: You must follow the court order.

plain_meaning_en: Creates the official record of proceedings.
example_en: The court reporter noted the time.

plain_meaning_en: Record of convictions/history.
Question the other party’s witness to test evidence.
plain_meaning_tr: Karşı taraf tanığını sorgulayarak beyanı sınamak.

plain_meaning_en: Lawyer prosecuting on behalf of the state.
Lawyer representing the accused.
Order keeping accused in custody pending trial.
Questioning of your own witness (non-leading).
plain_meaning_tr: Kendi tanığını yönlendirici olmayan sorularla sorgulama.

plain_meaning_en: Crown’s evidence/material provided to defence.
plain_meaning_tr: Savcılığın savunmaya verdiği delil ve belgeler.
example_en: We need time to review disclosure.

plain_meaning_en: Legal Aid lawyer providing brief help in court.
plain_meaning_tr: Mahkemede kısa destek veren adli yardım avukatı.
example_en: Duty counsel can assist you today.

plain_meaning_en: Choice about mode of trial in certain cases.
plain_meaning_tr: Bazı dosyalarda yargılama türünü seçme hakkı.

plain_meaning_en: Parts the Crown must prove to convict.
example_en: All essential elements must be proven.

plain_meaning_en: Information presented in court.
Item admitted and numbered as evidence.
plain_meaning_tr: Delil olarak kabul edilip numaralanan belge/nesne.

plain_meaning_en: Qualified witness giving technical opinions.
Order requiring keep the peace and other conditions.
plain_meaning_tr: Kişinin huzuru koruma ve koşullara uyma yükümlülüğü.

plain_meaning_en: Kept in custody pending next court date; case is remanded.
plain_meaning_tr: Bir sonraki duruşmaya kadar tutuklu kalma / dosyanın ertelenmesi.
example_tr: Tutuklu yargılanmak üzere gözaltına/tutukluluğa iade edildi.

plain_meaning_en: Police document requiring appearance and conditions.
plain_meaning_tr: Polisçe verilen; mahkemeye gelme ve koşullere uyma belgesi.

plain_meaning_en: Sentence condition supervising offender in community.
example_en: He is on probation for 12 months.
